A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie exceeded all of my expectations\, it is without a doubt the worst Star Wars movie I've ever seen. It \,however\, did make the prequels more enjoyable for me to watch since I can't bring myself to sit through this dumpster fire again. Congratulations to Rian Johnson for  ruining the sequel trilogy and doing serious damage to the brand. I feel sorry for Ron Howard having to follow this hack. It's difficult to drum up interest in new films when the most recent one was a steaming pile of refuse. IThere are so many things to dislike about this movie that I will only name a few : The racist\,stereotypical depiction of Poe Dameron\, turning Finn into a court jester and the sexist depiction of Leia and Holdo making them the worst military commanders in the history of  cinema .
